property.name: backgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The background color for containers; for non-containers, the parent background color.
property.description: The paint color and style is defined in this brush object.This property is only supported for controls like  dropdownlist, edittext, and listbox.

property.name: disabledBackgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The background color for containers when disabled or inactive; for non-containers, the parent background color.
property.description: The paint color and style is defined in this brush object.This property is only supported for controls like  dropdownlist, edittext, and listbox.

property.name: disabledForegroundColor
property.shortdesc: The text color when the element is disabled or inactive.
property.description: The paint color and style is defined in this pen object.

property.name: font
property.shortdesc: The default font to use for displaying text.

property.name: foregroundColor
property.description: The paint color and style is defined in this pen object.

property.name: currentPath
property.shortdesc: The current drawing path, encapsulated in a path object.

property.name: currentPoint
property.shortdesc: The current position in the current drawing path.

method.name: newBrush
method.shortdesc: Creates a new painting brush object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.shortdesc: The brush type, solid or theme.

parameters.name: color
parameters.shortdesc: The brush color.

method.name: newPen
method.shortdesc: Creates a new drawing pen object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.shortdesc: The pen type, solid or theme.

parameters.name: color
parameters.shortdesc: The pen color.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width of the pen line in pixels.
parameters.description: The line is centered around the current point. For example, if the value is 2, drawing a line from (0, 10) to (5, 10) paints the two rows of pixels directly above and below y-position 10.

method.name: newPath
method.shortdesc: Creates a new, empty path object.

parameters.name: x
parameters.shortdesc: The X coordinate for the new point, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: y
parameters.shortdesc: The Y coordinate for the new point, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: x
parameters.shortdesc: The X coordinate for the destination point, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: y
parameters.shortdesc: The Y coordinate for the destination point, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: left
parameters.shortdesc: The left coordinate relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: top
parameters.shortdesc: The top coordinate relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.shortdesc: The height in pixels.

parameters.name: left
parameters.shortdesc: The left coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: top
parameters.shortdesc: The top coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width of the region in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.shortdesc: The height of the region in pixels.

method.name: strokePath
method.shortdesc: Strokes the path segments of a path with a given drawing pen.

parameters.name: pen
parameters.shortdesc: The drawing pen that defines the color and line width.

method.name: fillPath
method.shortdesc: Fills a path using a given painting brush.

parameters.name: brush
parameters.shortdesc: The brush object that defines the fill color.

method.name: drawFocusRing
method.shortdesc: Draws a focus ring within a region of this element.

parameters.name: left
parameters.shortdesc: The left coordinate of the region.
parameters.description: Value is relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: top
parameters.shortdesc: The top coordinate of the region.
parameters.description: Value is relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width of the region in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.shortdesc: The height of the region in pixels.

method.name: drawImage
method.shortdesc: Draws an image within a given region of the element.
method.description: Uses the version of the image that is appropriate to the element's current state.

parameters.name: image
parameters.shortdesc: The image to draw.
parameters.description: This object contains different versions of an image appropriate to various element states, such as a dimmed version for the disabled state.

parameters.name: left
parameters.shortdesc: The left coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: top
parameters.shortdesc: The top coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width in pixels. If provided, the image is stretched or shrunk to fit. If omitted, uses the original image width.

parameters.name: height
parameters.shortdesc: The height in pixels. If provided, the image is stretched or shrunk to fit. If omitted, uses the original image height.

method.name: drawOSControl
method.shortdesc: Draw the platform-specific control associated with this element.

method.name: drawString
method.shortdesc: Draw a string of text starting at a given point in this element, using a given drawing pen and font.

parameters.name: text
parameters.shortdesc: The text string.

parameters.name: pen
parameters.shortdesc: The drawing pen to use.

parameters.name: x
parameters.shortdesc: The left coordinate, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: y
parameters.shortdesc: The top coordinate, relative to the origin of this element.

method.name: measureString
method.shortdesc: Calculates the size needed to display a string using the given font.

parameters.name: text
parameters.shortdesc: The text string to measure.

parameters.name: boundingWidth
parameters.shortdesc: The bounding width.
